title: How to Draw Mr. Krabs from SpongeBob SquarePants

steps.headline: Draw a small inverted cone shape.
Draw two long and thin protruding ovals for the eyes.
steps.description: Add 3 small ellipse shape on each eye for his eyelashes.

steps.headline: Draw the wavy long nose and three bumps at the back of his head.
Add details to the face like circular pupils on the eye and curve line for a smiling mouth.
steps.description: Draw small details of his shirt like the collar and undershirt.

steps.headline: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
Try drawing Mr Krabs’ other facial expressions.
Draw large inverted cone shape, this will be the body.
Draw two circles at the left and right side of the body, this will be the hands.
Connect the hands and the body with thin arms bent at the middle.
steps.description: Bellow the body draw two small "v" shapes for the feet.

steps.headline: Add details to the face.
steps.description: Draw the long eyes, long wavy nose, 3 bumps on the back of the head and curved line for the mouth.

steps.headline: Draw Mr Krabs outfit.
steps.description: His shirt and pants with the belt.

steps.headline: Draw the bumps on his crab hands using short curved strokes.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
text: Drawing a Close Up Draw a small inverted cone shape.  Draw two long and thin protruding ovals for the eyes. Add 3 small ellipse shape on each eye for his eyelashes. Draw the wavy long nose and three bumps at the back of his head.  Add details to the face like circular pupils on the eye and curve line for a smiling mouth. Draw small details of his shirt like the collar and undershirt. Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.  Colour your drawing.  Try drawing Mr Krabs’ other facial expressions.  Drawing the Full Body Draw large inverted cone shape, this will be the body.  Draw two circles at the left and right side of the body, this will be the hands.  Connect the hands and the body with thin arms bent at the middle. Bellow the body draw two small "v" shapes for the feet. Add details to the face. Draw the long eyes, long wavy nose, 3 bumps on the back of the head and curved line for the mouth. Draw Mr Krabs outfit. His shirt and pants with the belt. Draw the bumps on his crab hands using short curved strokes.  Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.  Colour your drawing.
sentences: Drawing a Close Up Draw a small inverted cone shape.
Draw two long and thin protruding ovals for the eyes.
Add 3 small ellipse shape on each eye for his eyelashes.
Draw the wavy long nose and three bumps at the back of his head.
Add details to the face like circular pupils on the eye and curve line for a smiling mouth.
Draw small details of his shirt like the collar and undershirt.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
Colour your drawing.
Try drawing Mr Krabs’ other facial expressions.
Drawing the Full Body Draw large inverted cone shape, this will be the body.
Draw two circles at the left and right side of the body, this will be the hands.
Connect the hands and the body with thin arms bent at the middle.
Bellow the body draw two small "v" shapes for the feet.
Add details to the face.
Draw the long eyes, long wavy nose, 3 bumps on the back of the head and curved line for the mouth.
Draw Mr Krabs outfit.
His shirt and pants with the belt.
Draw the bumps on his crab hands using short curved strokes.
Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
Colour your drawing.
